org.aludratest.scheduler

Class AnnotationBasedExecution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.scheduler.AnnotationBasedExecution

  • public final class AnnotationBasedExecution
extends Object
    Configuration class for invoking RunnerTreeBuilder.buildRunnerTree(AnnotationBasedExecution). Instances of this class specify where to search for classes, which filter and grouping to use, and which class loader (if any) to use.
    You can use the static tool method parseFilterString(String) to build a test class filter from a text-based filter definition.
    Author:
    falbrech

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new annotation based execution configuration object.

      Returns the test class filter specified by this configuration object.
      List<String> getGroupingAttributes()
      Returns the attribute names which shall be used for grouping, or an empty list to indicate to use the package names instead.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnotationBasedExecution

        public AnnotationBasedExecution(File jarOrClassRoot,
                                TestClassFilter filter,
                                List<String> groupingAttributes,
                                ClassLoader classLoader)
        Creates a new annotation based execution configuration object.
        Parameters:
        jarOrClassRoot - Location to search for Java class or source files. MUST be a valid root, i.e. no subdirectory like org/aludratest, because this would cause the class name resolution to fail.
        If this specifies a file, it is treated as JAR archive, and its entries are searched to determine contained class names. Otherwise, the specified folder is recursively searched for .class and .java files to determine class names. The classes are not directly loaded, but the specified or the default class loader is asked for a class with the determined name.
        filter - Filter to use to determine which classes to use.
        groupingAttributes - List of attributes to use for grouping the tests. If empty, the package names are used instead.
        classLoader - Class loader to use to load the classes, or null. When null, the classes are loaded with Class.forName(String).

    • Method Detail

      • getJarOrClassRoot

        public File getJarOrClassRoot()

      • getClassLoader

        public ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Returns the class loader to use to load classes from found class names, or null to use Class.forName(String) instead.
        Returns:
        The class loader to use to load classes from found class names, or null.

      • parseFilterString

        public static TestClassFilter parseFilterString(String filterString)
                                         throws ParseException
        Builds a new test class filter from the given filter string. The filter string must be in the filter string syntax specified in AludraTest documentation. Two examples follow: 
         author=(jdoe,mmiller);status!=(InWork;Draft);application=Core
 author!=jdoe|status=Approved
        Note that the attribute names and values are completely test-application specific and must be provided via TestAttribute or TestAttributes annotations on the test classes.
        Parameters:
        filterString - String based definition of the test class filter.
        Returns:
        A filter built from the given string based definition, which can be used to filter test classes.
        Throws:
        ParseException - If the filter string has an invalid syntax.
